entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 10 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then west 20 late in the afternoon. High 10 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
